phases.name: Purchase Orders
phases.goal: Move all PO creation and arrivals to SERP. On arrival, push quantities to Odoo for inventory updates.

phases.name: Bills, Products, Manufacturing & COGS
phases.milestone: Bills, Products, MO & COGS Live in SERP
phases.goal: Mirror Odoo's core tables in Laravel: vendor_bills, boms, manufacturing_orders, stock_quants, stock_valuation_layer. Shadow system enables reconciliation before Phase 4 cutover.

phases.name: Kits
phases.goal: Migrate 265 phantom BOMs from Odoo to Laravel kits table. Validate kit-to-buyer_product links and order expansion logic.

phases.name: Inventory Management
phases.goal: Move all inventory tracking to SERP. Fix concurrency, build PO arrival and MO completion inventory flows. Odoo becomes deprecated.
